actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Denham amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Denham.

description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to authorize enlistment in the Armed Forces of certain undocumented immigrants who are otherwise qualified for enlistment, and provide a way for the undocumented immigrants to be lawfully admitted to the U.S. for permanent residence by reason of their honorable service and sacrifice in the U.S. military.
purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to authorize enlistment in the Armed Forces of certain undocumented immigrants who are otherwise qualified for enlistment, and provide a way for the undocumented immigrants to be lawfully admitted to the U.S. for permanent residence by reason of their honorable service and sacrifice in the U.S. military.
